001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.util.Log;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.Menu;
007import android.view.View;
008import android.view.ViewGroup;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import androidx.appcompat.widget.PopupMenu;
012import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
013import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
014import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.adapter.PassphrasesAdapter;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.FragmentPassphrasesBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.PassphraseViewModel;
020
021public class PassphrasesFragment extends Fragment {
022
023  private FragmentPassphrasesBinding binding;
024  private PassphraseViewModel viewModel;
025
026  @Nullable
027  @Override
028  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
029      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
030    binding = FragmentPassphrasesBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
031    binding.refresh.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.fetch());
032    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
033    binding.search.setOnClickListener((v) ->
034        viewModel.search(binding.searchText.getText().toString()));
035    binding.create.setOnClickListener((v) -> openDialog(null));
036    return binding.getRoot();
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
041    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
042    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
043        .get(PassphraseViewModel.class);
044    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
045    viewModel
046        .getPassphrases()
047        .observe(
048            getViewLifecycleOwner(),
049            (passphrases) ->
050                binding.passphrases.setAdapter(
051                    new PassphrasesAdapter(
052                        requireContext(),
053                        passphrases,
054                        (v, pos, passphrase) -> openDialog(passphrase.getKey()),
055                        (v, pos, passphrase) -> showPopUpMenu(v, passphrase)
056                    )
057                )
058        );
059  }
060
061  private void openDialog(String key) {
062    Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot())
063        .navigate(PassphrasesFragmentDirections.openEditPassphraseFragment().setKey(key));
064  }
065
066  private void showPopUpMenu(View view, Passphrase passphrase) {
067    PopupMenu popup = new PopupMenu(requireContext(), view);
068    Menu menu = popup.getMenu();
069    popup.getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.passphrase_actions, menu);
070    menu.findItem(R.id.edit_passphrase).setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
071      openDialog(passphrase.getKey());
072      return true;
073    });
074    menu.findItem(R.id.delete_passphrase).setOnMenuItemClickListener((item) -> {
075      // TODO: 11/7/23 Ask for user confirmation.
076      viewModel.delete(passphrase.getKey());
077      // TODO: 11/7/23 Modify PassphraseViewModel to refresh automatically after successful creation, update, or deletion.
078      return true;
079    });
080    popup.show();
081  }
082}
